Detailed Description

A class to encapsulate generating and rendering a font.

This object handles creating a font using GDI and then copying it into a texture, and also handles drawing a string based on the data generated from GDI.

Initializes the font.

Initializes the font using GDI to generate a 'sprite list' of every character within the character set range.
